name: Virtual Super Hero Family Vs Super Villain
name_original: Virtual Super Hero Family Vs Super Villain
description:
Become member of virtual superhero family!! Grow and play the virtual super hero family vs super villian action simulator that is specially designed for the superheroes games lovers.Joined the virtual super hero family and play like a super spider hero, super flash hero and super hulk. Get ready to fight against the super villian and gangster of the grand city. The police of vice city is badly beaten by super villian and mafia.People of vice city are looking for your help no one comes after you.
Virtual super hero family vs super villian gives you the chance to restrain the city peace by eliminating city gangsters with your super immortal powers and fighting skills. Be the best superhero of the vice city by fighting battle with city gangsters and destroying all of them . Show your immortal superhero powers and fighting skills to spread terror in under world gangster mafia. Virtual super hero vs super villains action simulation containing devastating and thrilling mission to play. You are the city defenders with full of amazing attacking capabilities like, playing as a virtual super hero or other super heroes you can attack on enemies with swords, heavy hammer, web and with the steel claws.
Be the member of virtual superhero family vs super villian action simulator contains amazing gameplay and thrilling missions. Choose your best superhero, super spider hero, super falsh hero and hulk to fight against the criminals and gangster to save the children and civillian of voice city.Show your super immortal powers using special attackimg weapons like killer sowrd, powerful punch, amazing web, and speedy claws. Step by step challenging missions made this game more thrilling and impossible fighting. You have to chase the gangsters in amazing sports cars to fight with. Show your amazing fighting skills against the most dangerous mafia agents and super villains. Unlock more war missions and super powers attack with every successful mission. Enjoy this super action adventure 3D simulation with a variety of thrilling rescue missions. 

Virtual Super Hero Family Vs Super Villian Features:
Multiple superheroes like Super spider hero, super flash hero and hulk.
3d Action simulation with thrilling challenges.
Realistic gameplay and sound effects.
Multiple super attcks with smooth controls.
This superhero game gives you the choice to become a superhero to destroy city mafia. The environment of this action adventure fighting game allows you to act like a super hero of a criminal city full of black terrorists, gangster mobs, mafia world & street thugs to spread crime. Kill all the villain terrorists with combat fighting to save the people of voice city.
